game.name: ULTRAKILL
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: ULTRAKILL is a fast-paced ultraviolent retro FPS combining the skill-based style scoring from character action games with unadulterated carnage inspired by the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart your foes with varied destructive weapons and shower in their blood to regain your health.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ULTRAKILL is a fast-paced ultraviolent retro FPS combining the skill-based style scoring from character action games with unadulterated carnage inspired by the best shooters of the '90s. Rip apart your foes with varied destructive weapons and shower in their blood to regain your health.

reviewHighlights.text: 템포 빠른 둠. 둠은 찢어죽이는게 목적이라면 이 게임은 누가 창의적이고 빠르고 정확하게 악마들을 죽이는지 보는 게임임. 스토리 신경 안쓰고 좀 더 빠른 진행을 원한다? 이거 해보셈.
게임성이며 스토리며 다 완벽했다고 봄.. 태어나서 울트라킬 해본게 내 최대 업적인듯..
